name: Melinda's Magical Tavern
description:
Melinda's Magical Tavern

Sigh, I uploaded with the wrong stretch mode. Lame! I hope you still enjoy :D

Controls
  • Click  - on the highlighted items to pick up / deliver to customer
  • Esc/x - to cancel the current queued actions.
  • Space - to put yourself to sleep
Credits

The Music was created by my friend Sepulger. I (Ghostrix98) did the art & coding.

Story

Some notes about the story I was aimming for.
(Copy and pasted from my design doc :D)

Set in a magical tavern. You are a (witch-ish) tavern owner, seeking to make extra money during the festive season. To reach your money goal you've decide to open up the tavern for 24 hours, everyday, for a few days.

Problem is, you are run the tavern solo and the lack of sleep is starting to affect you really badly. After working for a while without short breaks in between, you black out for a short amount of time.

In between when there's no customers around you take naps so you're not totally exhausted but of course you can't rest for too long because you need that fast moneyyy :D.

Juggle making money while also trying not to completely ruin your reputation by losing too many customers.
